member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSException
member.summary: Represents an exception initiated from the JavaScript interop code.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JSException class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSExportAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a source generator should export the attributed method to JavaScript and create thunks necessary to marshal its arguments and any return value or thrown exception.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSExportAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSHost
member.summary: Represents the JavaScript host environment where the .NET runtime is currently operating.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSHost.ImportAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads and instantiates an ES6 module from the provided URL, via the JavaScript host's dynamic import API. If a module with the provided has previously been instantiated, it will be returned instead.
member.param: Globally unique identifier of the ES6 module, which is used by .
The location of the module file.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A proxy for the JavaScript object that contains the module's exports.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSHost.DotnetInstance
member.summary: Returns a proxy for the JavaScript module that contains the .NET runtime.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSHost.GlobalThis
member.summary: Returns a proxy for the globalThis JavaScript host object.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSImportAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the JSImport source generator should create a managed wrapper to invoke a specific imported JavaScript function and marshal its arguments, return values, and exceptions.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the function to be bound in the module. Use dots for nested objects.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the target JavaScript function. This name will be used as a key to locate the function in the module. Functions nested inside of objects can be referred to by using the dot operator to connect one or more names.
Globally unique identifier of the ES6 module, if any, that contains the function. The module must be loaded via before any attempt to invoke the function.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSImportAttribute.FunctionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the target JavaScript function. This name will be used as a key to locate the function in the module.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSImportAttribute.ModuleName
member.summary: Gets the globally unique identifier of the ES6 module, if any, that contains the function. The module must be loaded via before any attempt to invoke the function.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSMarshalAsAttribute`1
member.summary: Specifies the JavaScript type associated with a managed argument or return value. The JSImport generator will use this information to marshal data between the JavaScript and managed environments.
member.typeparam: One of the types defined in , for example .

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSMarshalAsAttribute`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of configured by generic parameters of .

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSMarshalerArgument.ArgumentToJSCallback`1
member.summary: Assists in marshalling of Task results and Function arguments. This API is used by JSImport code generator and should not be used by developers in source code.
member.typeparam: The type of the marshalled value.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSMarshalerArgument.ArgumentToManagedCallback`1
member.summary: Assists in marshalling of Task results and Function arguments. This API is used by JSImport code generator and should not be used by developers in source code.
member.typeparam: The type of the marshalled value.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject
member.summary: Represents a reference to an object in the JavaScript host environment and enables interaction with it as a proxy.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetPropertyAsBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified property as if the property exists, otherwise .
member.exception: The property value is not a .
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetPropertyAsByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified property as a array if the property exists, otherwise .
member.exception: The property value is not an array.
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetPropertyAsDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the property as if the property exists, otherwise 0.
member.exception: The property value is not a number.
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetPropertyAsInt32(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the property as if the property exists, otherwise 0.
member.exception: The property value is not an integer.
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.summary: Returns the value of the property as proxy if the property exists, otherwise .
member.exception: The property value is not a .
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetPropertyAsString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the property as if the property exists, otherwise .
member.exception: The property value is not a string.
member.returns: The value of the property with the specified name.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.GetTypeOfProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Returns typeof() of the property.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSObject.HasProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the target object or one of its prototypes has a property with the specified name.
member.returns: when the object has the property with the specified name.

member.summary: Defines a new property on the target object, or modifies an existing property to have the specified value.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the proxy was already disposed.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType
member.summary: Used as the generic argument for to express the expected JavaScript type, which should be the source or result of argument marshalling.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Any
member.summary: Dynamically selects the most appropriate JavaScript or managed type for each argument value at run time.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Array`1
member.summary: Marshals as a copy of the JavaScript Array or TypedArray type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.BigInt
member.summary: Marshal as JavaScript BigInt type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Boolean
member.summary: Marshal as JavaScript Boolean type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Date
member.summary: Marshal as JavaScript Date type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Discard
member.summary: Suppresses marshalling of the JavaScript function's return value and discards it.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Error
member.summary: Marshals as the JavaScript Error type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.Function
member.summary: Marshals as the JavaScript Function type.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSType.MemoryView
